How to diagnose Parasites - Angiostrongyliasis (also known as Angiostrongylus Infection) ?,"Angiostrongylus cantonensis
    
Diagnosing A. cantonensis infections can be difficult, in part because there are no readily available blood tests. Important clues that could lead to the diagnosis of infection are a his
